clang-analyzer-nullability.NullableDeref.description:
Description

clang-analyzer-nullability.NullableDereferenced
Warns when a nullable pointer is dereferenced.
The
clang-analyzer-nullability.NullableDereferenced
check is an alias, please see
Clang Static Analyzer Available Checkers
for more information.
clang-analyzer-nullability.NullableDeref.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
